entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Guysborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C
entry.summary:

Wind: NE 20 km/h

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023
